text: First, the table shows that out of 803 voters polled, 483 said they would vote for Angel Cruz and 320 for Terry Smith. The question is asking, if this poll is accurate, how many more votes would Angel Cruz get than Terry Smith when the actual election happens with 6,424 voters. The answer choices are given, so I need to calculate the expected difference.
